ModMetadata.Name: LibConstruct
ModMetadata.Author: tom_is_unlucky
ModMetadata.Description:
[h1]LibConstruct[/h1] This is a library for custom placement in Stationeers. It does nothing on its own but provides functionality to other mods.
[url=https://github.com/tsholmes/StationeersLibConstruct]Source on Github[/url] This requires BepInEx and a [url=https://github.com/StationeersLaunchPad/StationeersLaunchPad]StationeersLaunchPad[/url] v0.2.x
ModMetadata.ChangeLog: [h3]Version 0.2.2[/h3] [list] [*]Fix for structure list changes on beta [/list]
